A

actionTimer() - Method in class entities.Senshiyan
called by animation, manages the timing of the actions of the senshiyan (aiming, firing, moving)
active - Variable in class entities.Collider
tells if the collider is to be controlled or not
active - Variable in class entities.Entity
tells if the object is to be considere by the gamePanel
activePowerUp() - Method in class entities.PowerUp
called by update, triggers the change of stats of the player calling its method activePowerUp
activePowerUp(String) - Method in class entities.Player
called by the powerUp's method activePowerUp, change the stats of player based on the power up activated
aiming - Variable in class entities.Senshiyan
used in the switch of sprites
animation() - Method in class entities.Bomb
called by the draw method of the object, manages which images display based on the surroundings and on the status of exploded or not
animation() - Method in class entities.Senshiyan
called by update, manages the image sequence and the timing of actions (aiming, firing, moving9
averageTime - Variable in class main.GamePanel
variable used for debug timeOfDrawingCronometer
